QuestData.Title: A Gift From The Clan
QuestData.Description:
Speaker Utia has requested that I direct you back to Mezzamere when you have a chance, $n.
Our clan has prepared a gift for you to show our appreciation for the courage and valor you have shown in battle against the naga.
I am sure that you will find the gift of supplies to be a valuable addition to your arsenal as you continue your campaign against Azshara.
